reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Linking potato sub-sectors investors and actors in Tanzania and Finland for enhancing smallholder food and income security

description.narrative: This initiative's goal is to help potato subsector growth and development contributing to food and income security.Main Activities:Seven key actors in Potato Value chain actors undertake business trip to Finland Potato business actors and establish agribu siness linkagesExpected Outcomes of the initiative are:1. Acquisition of modern technologies and methodologies from Finland to Tanzania for enhanced development of the potato sub-sector in a business approach in the next ten years2. Joint venture investmen t in the potato sub-sector initiated and developed among Tanzanian and Finnish potato sub-sector actors3. Sustainability of previous Finnish Government intervention in the potato subsector in Tanzania by stimulating and encouraging private sector investmen t enhanced
